_documentation.purpose: Optional appraiser-derived adjustment factors to override calculator-derived values
_documentation.usage: Pass with --adjustments flag: python comparable_sales_calculator.py input.json --adjustments factors.json
_documentation.priority: 1) Appraiser overrides (this file), 2) Paired sales derived, 3) Industry defaults
instructions: Only include factors you have market evidence to support
Document your derivation method and source for each factor
Leave factors as null to use calculator-derived or default values

market_conditions._comment: Time adjustments - derive from repeat sales or market indices

appreciation_rate_annual_pct.source: GeoWarehouse repeat sales Jan 2023 - Jan 2025, 45 pairs

location_adjustments._comment: Location differentials - derive from paired sales in different submarkets

submarket_differentials.source: Paired sales analysis, similar properties different submarkets

highway_frontage_premium_pct.source: 8 paired sales: frontage vs interior, same submarket

size_adjustments._comment: Size adjustments - derive from regression or paired sales showing economies of scale

building_sf.notes: Leave null - calculator will derive from comparable set

lot_size_acres.notes: Leave null - calculator will derive from comparable set

physical_adjustments_industrial._comment: Industrial building characteristics - derive from cost approach or paired sales

clear_height.source: Marshall & Swift, steel frame construction, additional height cost

loading_docks_dock_high.source: RS Means 2024, dock-high door with leveler installed

condition.source: Regression analysis of 85 industrial sales, condition coefficient

rail_spur.source: Rail spur installation cost $400K depreciated + broker interviews

crane_systems.source: Marshall & Swift overhead crane costs, depreciated

building_class.source: BOMA classification standards, CoStar rent differentials capitalized

parking_ratio.source: Surface parking construction $3,500, structured $25,000 per space

appraiser_certification.notes: Adjustment factors certified as supported by market evidence
